data.actual_result: - Clyde eats my wumpus and asks me to buy Nitro, instead of saying you cant post external emojis
data.expected_result: Clyde tells me that external emojis are disabled
data.short_description: Using nitro emote feature, causes clyde to be incorrect
data.steps_to_repro: - Buy sweet, sweet Discord Nitro - Go onto a server where external emojis are disabled - ensure that this is the first time youve seen the discord nitro message from clyde as thats how the discord (sort of) tutorial works - type an external emoji
